creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: group of people gathered around a fruit cart, illuminated by one lamp; buildings and a few other people in shadows in background; dog in LLC
inscription:
Signature

in graphite on verso: [MG - 83 - 18 - HR.PE]
portfolio: From Good Entertainment A New Book of Figure Studies
provenance: [Paul McCarron, New York; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: initialed in plate, upper right: [inverted P]. (Martin Hardie views this as a lowercase \"d\")
title: A London Fruit Stall by Night, From Good Entertainment A New Book of Figure Studies
